metadata.summary: Explains event atoms as GUIDs that relate events through parent-child relationships and how to construct event trees using API endpoints
metadata.primary_use_case: Understand event correlation and construct process/event trees for investigations

extracted_apis.description: Get children events of an atom

cross_refs.description: Commands generate events with REP suffix that must be enabled in Exfil
Each command in reference lists its corresponding REP event type
